title: Stadia Changelog: Google finally passes 20 new games this year, over four months later
content:
The pace of new games on Google Stadia in 2022 has been slow, to say the least, with merely 20 new games available as the month of May starts.

more…

The post Stadia Changelog: Google finally passes 20 new games this year, over four months later appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Over four months into 2022, Google Stadia has finally added 20 new games to its catalog during this calendar year.
